CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Output.​Components.​HTMLTopicPages.​File
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Output.​Components.​HTMLTopicPage
public
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Output.​Components.​HTMLTopicPages.​File

Creates a HTMLTopicPage for a source file.

Threading: Not Thread Safe

This class is only designed to be used by one thread at a time.

Functions
File
public File (
Builders.HTML htmlBuilder,
int fileID
)
GetTopics
public override List<Topic> GetTopics (
CodeDB.Accessor accessor,
CancelDelegate cancelDelegate
)

Retrieves the Topics in the file.

If the CodeDB.Accessor doesn't have a lock this function will acquire and release a read-only lock.  If it already has a lock it will use it and not release it.

GetLinks
public override List<Link> GetLinks (
CodeDB.Accessor accessor,
CancelDelegate cancelDelegate
)

Retrieves the Links appearing in the file.

If the CodeDB.Accessor doesn't have a lock this function will acquire and release a read-only lock.  If it already has a lock it will use it and not release it.

Path Properties
OutputFile
override public Path OutputFile { get }

The path of the topic page's output file, or null if none.  It may be null if the <FileSource> that created it no longer exists.

OutputFileHashPath
override public string OutputFileHashPath { get }

The hash path of the topic page, or null if none.  It may be null if the <FileSource> that created it no longer exists.

OutputFileNameOnly
public Path OutputFileNameOnly { get }

The output file name of topic page without the path.

OutputFileNameOnlyHashPath
public string OutputFileNameOnlyHashPath { get }

The file name portion of the topic page's hash path.

ToolTipsFile
override public Path ToolTipsFile { get }

The path of the topic page's tool tips file, or null if none.  It may be null if the <FileSource> that created it no longer exists.

ToolTipsFileNameOnly
public Path ToolTipsFileNameOnly { get }

The file name of the topic page's tool tips file without the path.

SummaryFile
override public Path SummaryFile { get }

The path of the topic page's summary file, or null if none.  It may be null if the <FileSource> that created it no longer exists.

SummaryFileNameOnly
public Path SummaryFileNameOnly { get }

The file name of the topic page's summary file without the path.

SummaryToolTipsFile
override public Path SummaryToolTipsFile { get }

The path of the topic page's summary tool tips file, or null if none.  It may be null if the <FileSource> that created it no longer exists.

SummaryToolTipsFileNameOnly
public Path SummaryToolTipsFileNameOnly { get }

The file name of the topic page's summary tool tips file without the path.

Variables
fileID
protected int fileID

The ID of the file that this object is building.
